channel.title: Disqus on Reusing the wheel
channel.description: Recent content in Disqus on Reusing the wheel

item.title: Migrating to Hugo and GitHub Pages
item.description: I wanted to have greater control over my blog, so I’ve been thinking about moving it to a self-hosted WordPress installation. In the end, I decided to migrate from WordPress to a static blog generated with Hugo and hosted on GitHub Pages. This post will be the last one posted on reusingthewheel.wordpress.com - the future ones will be posted on piotr-rusin.github.io.
